tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    device_id UUID,
    record_data JSONB,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE healthcare_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    record_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    record_date DATE NOT NULL,
    record_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE iot_devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_location VARCHAR(100),
    device_owner VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  medical_history TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT patient_id_unique UNIQUE(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalDevices (
  device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  device_type VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
  CONSTRAINT device_id_unique UNIQUE(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AccessControl (
  access_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT REFERENCES MedicalDevices(device_id),
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  permission_level VARCHAR(20),
  CONSTRAINT access_id_unique UNIQUE(access_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    birth_date DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE AccessControl (
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    access_level VARCHAR(20),
    CONSTRAINT fk_device FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoTDevices(device_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_patient FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_records (
    record_id UUID NOT NULL,
    patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
    doctor_id UUID NOT NULL,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    prescription TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (record_id)
)

CREATE TABLE medical_iot_devices (
    device_id UUID NOT NULL,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_location VARCHAR(100),
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id)
)

CREATE TABLE access_control (
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    device_id UUID NOT NULL,
    access_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    grant_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES medical_iot_devices(device_id)
)

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id UUID NOT NULL,
    contract_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contract_details TEXT,
    deployment_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (contract_id)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
)
